attributes.action: Reduce University fees from £9000 a year to £3000 or lower
attributes.additional_details: The decrease of £6000 per university student per year will reduce the government's income, however, those expenses do not have to affect other public sectors, the government can simply reduce amounts given in grants and student fina
attributes.background: This one's self-explanatory, students shouldn't have to have this large burden of debt put on them after they have left university, I acknowledge that the debt is paid proportionally to the individual's wage, but during their experience at university living costs and rent can add up for parents.
